name: Gladiator Academy
description:
The Gladiator Academy has an ongoing competition with the School for Gladiators. You are hired as the new manager and the Academy's fate lies in your hands. Train your Gladiators for upcoming arena battles, cure your survivors or recruit fresh meat to raise the Academy's Fame.

Ludum-Dare-44 : "Your life is currency"
